Green-Banana: english is not "internet language" you moran. 
"Internet language" is made of only ones and zeros.

@sampagne1991
Download 7zip, just look it up on google and download.
Open file with 7zip.
Once opened, Double-click "Hidden_Springs_1,5.Sims3Pack"
Install. If it tells you to update The Sims 3, go to the update tab, click refresh, and a download will come up. Install update(s) and the Pack.

There ya go!

Damien74:Just to be clear. 0's and 1's are NOT the "internet language". That is the machine language(binary)!!
The internet language is slang like BTW,WTF,OMG etc.
